words.def: a small narrow pointed missile that is thrown or shot
Transitive and intransitive To damn or curse.
traditional jazz as revived in the 1950s
a unit of absorbed ionizing radiation equal to 100 ergs per gram of irradiated material
a slight amount or degree of difference
any of various long-tailed rodents similar to but larger than a mouse
any of various dark heavy viscid substances obtained as a residue
a public promotion of some product or service

a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
